entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Dorion
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:28 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 6:23 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:23 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
